title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Chromatography: Method selection; selection of matrix; gel filtration; ionexchange chromatography; affinity chromatography; hydrophobic interaction chromatography; FPLC: Different modes of FPLC, isocratic and gradient operations, normal
